Text: Thnx my friend.  I always look forward to your uploads
Made an account just to say thanks, man! You're doing the gods' work!

You are the first and ONLY uploader that I've actually bookmarked and regularly check. Thank you and please NEVER stop doing what you do. You make it so much easier for us all to keep up with the New 52 :D
Have you considered also making a Marvel Week?
